name: Dimensional Explorer
description:
Dimensional Explorer is a 2D Puzzle Platformer full of secrets to find!

There are 6 Crystals hidden in the levels for you to find, if you find them, well lets hope you like the message i left for you in the trophy room.

This was made in less than 7 days for the 8bits to Infinity VimJam 2020.

Disclaimer: Most of the art i found on itch.io i have modified most of it at some point, but i am not the original creator of most of the art, all creators are credited in  the credits screen on the main menu.

This is the first game project that i ever finished (And my first game jam), i have dropped lots of projects from just losing interest and motivation, but Vimlarks videos were the thing that motivated me to get to it, and then this game jam happened, so i joined it, and i finished this game, its not mind-blowingly great, but i finished it, so that is all it matters, to me at least.

Thank you Vimlark!

Hope you liked it!

Controls:

ArrowKeys - Movement

LeftClick - Shoot

RightClick - Interact

MouseWheel - Change bullet type

P - Pause

For a more in-depth tutorial go to the tutorial level from the Level Hub that can be accessed from the main menu.

There is a Download Version, and a Web Version.
